title: How to Choose the Perfect Wedding Venue
description: A comprehensive guide to finding and booking your dream wedding venue, with tips on budget, capacity, and location.

title: Budget Planning for Your Event
description: Learn how to create a realistic event budget and allocate funds across different suppliers and services.

title: Working with Event Suppliers: A Guide
description: Tips for communicating with suppliers, negotiating contracts, and building strong working relationships.

title: EventFlow Marketplace: Complete Guide for Buyers & Sellers
description: Learn how to buy and sell event items safely on the EventFlow Marketplace. Step-by-step guide for listing items, finding deals, and completing transactions securely.

title: Timeline: Planning Your Event Step-by-Step
description: A month-by-month timeline showing when to book suppliers, send invitations, and finalize details.
